      • setTestCaseExecutionStatus

        public void setTestCaseExecutionStatus(java.lang.String testCycleName,
                                       java.lang.String testCaseID,
                                       java.lang.String status)
        This method Demonstrates getSpecificExecutionID().
        Pass in the jira query from the test suite and the Specific test case Key, and returned the executionId for the test key
        Parameters:
        testCycleName - - Test case key QATEST-1234
        testCaseID - - passed/failed/wip/blocked
        status - - status of the test

      • updateJiraTestComment

        public void updateJiraTestComment(java.lang.String jiraTestID,
                                  java.lang.String title,
                                  java.lang.String comment,
                                  java.lang.String owner)
        This method Demonstrates updateJiraTestComment().
        When the automation test completes, update the test status PASS/FAIL from within a test suite.
        Following URL for help: https://docs.atlassian.com/jira/REST/7.0-SNAPSHOT/#api/2/issue-addComment
        Parameters:
        jiraTestID - test ID to be used
        title - comment comment to be added to the issue
        comment - comment to add
        owner - who is making the change

      • createTestCaseWithSteps

        public void createTestCaseWithSteps(java.lang.String projectKey,
                                    java.lang.String summary,
                                    java.lang.String description)
        This method Demonstrates createTestCaseWithSteps().
        Creates a new test case in the provided project
        Following URL for help: https://docs.atlassian.com/jira/REST/7.0-SNAPSHOT/#api/2/issue-addComment
        Parameters:
        projectKey - key to the project in the jira repository
        summary - summary of the change
        description - detail

      • addTestStepsToATest

        public void addTestStepsToATest(java.lang.String testID,
                                java.lang.String StepInfo,
                                java.lang.String testData,
                                java.lang.String results)
        This method Demonstrates updateTestStatusFromTestSuite().
        When the automation test completes, update the test status PASS/FAIL from within a test suite.
        Following URL for help: https://docs.atlassian.com/jira/REST/7.0-SNAPSHOT/#api/2/issue-addComment
        Parameters:
        testID - Jira ID
        StepInfo - comment comment to be added to the issue
        testData - data for the step
        results - expected results

      • updateJiraComment

        public void updateJiraComment(java.lang.String issueID,
                              java.lang.String comment)
                       throws java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException
        This method Demonstrates updateJiraComment().
        Updates the Jira ID with the supplied comment
        Following URL for help: https://docs.atlassian.com/jira/REST/7.0-SNAPSHOT/#api/2/issue-addComment
        Parameters:
        issueID - Jira ID
        comment - comment to be added to the issue
        Throws:
        java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException - if url can't be completed due replaceAll call
